backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing investment tracking system with user profiles, investments, transactions, session management, and resource content; includes authorization mixin and access control with various data structures stored in Maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three upload button improvements in the Features component: fixing flicker behavior, adding progress indicator, and displaying status messages.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend TypeScript/React files covering routing, authentication, components, hooks, configuration, and styling with focus on authentication guards and user interactions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode variables for a professional financial application aesthetic using warm neutral tones.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Investment Tracker application with root div and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with TanStack Router setup defining routes for Dashboard, Investments, Transactions (protected), Resources, and Features with authentication checks and profile setup flow.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard component displaying investment statistics, session state for authenticated investors, investment creation form, and recent investments with support for both authenticated and anonymous viewing modes.
frontend/src/components/Features.tsx: Component for uploading and displaying markdown feature files with search, pagination, and table view. Parses markdown content into feature items and provides file upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright year, branding with heart icon, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main navigation header with logo, user profile display, role badge, and navigation buttons for Dashboard, Investments, Resources, Features, and Transactions. Includes LoginButton component.
frontend/src/components/InvestmentCard.t: Card component displaying investment details with tabs for overview and transactions. Shows transaction totals, creation date, and provides dialog for adding new transactions with authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/InvestmentForm.t: Form for creating new investments with fields for name, description, e-project selection (from predefined list), payment mode, and transaction IDs. Validates inputs and requires authentication.
Displays a grid of all investments in the system with loading states and empty state handling. Shows investment cards with name, description, ID, investor principal, and creation date.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with session hash finalization for investors. Shows loading states and displays appropriate icons for auth status.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component for user profile creation with name, email, and role (ADMIN/INVESTOR) fields, using mutation hook to save profile data.
frontend/src/components/Resources.tsx: Displays parsed markdown resource content organized by categories (Security, Core Features, Technical, Support) and importance levels with search filtering and tabbed navigation.
Form component for creating transactions with fields for type, payment mode, amount, and transaction IDs, includes confirmation dialog and session management.
Displays a scrollable list of transactions for a specific investment with formatted amounts, types, modes, and transaction metadata.
frontend/src/components/TransactionsList: Full-page table view of all user transactions with detailed columns including type, mode, amount, IDs, timestamps, and session information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializes access control, and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with AuthClient integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for backend canister interactions including user profiles, investments, transactions, resources, and session management with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color schemes, including sidebar, chart, and UI component colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/types/features.ts: TypeScript interface defining the FeatureItem structure with id, text, and rawLine properties.
frontend/src/utils/featuresParser.ts: Utility function that parses markdown content to extract feature items from under a 'Features/Functions:' heading, removing bullet markers and numbering.
frontend/src/utils/markdownParser.ts: Comprehensive markdown parser that extracts list items, categorizes them by section/category/importance, and provides grouped views for documentation navigation.
frontend/src/utils/pagination.ts: Generic pagination utility function that slices arrays based on page size and page number (1-based indexing).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter utilities for extracting query parameters from both regular and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup functions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining theme extensions including custom colors using OKLCH color space, font families (Inter and JetBrains Mono), border radius variables, and keyframe animations for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking three feature requests to fix upload button flickering, add upload progress percentage indicator, and display success/error status messages in the Features component.
